author: holiman
content: Your second command there is wonky. Directly after init a new genesis, you ask it to export it's chain?? Should be `geth --datadir ./geth import chain.rlp`

author: holiman
content: And the import will exit, so you need to end it with e.g `geth --datadir ./geth --nodiscover`
